mapper.select:
select age, expert_name, sex, birth_date, political_face, place_origin, nation, college, education, unit_belongs, professional_and_time, technical_positiion, administrative_duties, mobile, email, user_desc, awards_title, brief_desc, data_id from zjk_data where 1=1

and expert_name like '%${expertName}%'
and sex like '%${sex}%'
and birth_date like '%${birthDate}%'
and political_face like '%${politicalFace}%'
and place_origin like '%${placeOrigin}%'
and nation like '%${nation}%'
and college like '%${college}%'

and unit_belongs like '%${unitBelongs}%'
and professional_and_time like '%${professionalAndTime}%'
and technical_positiion like '%${technicalPositiion}%'
and administrative_duties like '%${administrativeDuties}%'
and mobile like '%${mobile}%'
and email like '%${email}%'
and user_desc like '%${userDesc}%'
and awards_title like '%${awardsTitle}%'
and brief_desc like '%${briefDesc}%'
and data_id like '%${dataId}%'
order by ${iSortCol} ${sSortDir_0}
